conbody.p: This chapter describes the parameters required to configure SM operators and their roles in the NCC.

The SM operator, along with an appropriate role and access details can be configured after selection from the hamburger menu ( ) in this tab. The SM operator option allows you to configure an SM operator, enter contact information, authentication, authorization, and language requirements, as well as assign roles to the operator. The Roles option allows you to create specific roles and to assign security domains to those roles for the operators.
